description: Notifications when save configuration data operation finish.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 2) ? 'Save configuration data operation failed due to $v2' : 'Save data configuration operation status : $v1'

description: The status of save flash operation.
- success(1): The save flash operation is completed.
- failed(2): The save flash operation is failed.
- saving(3): The save flash is still in progress.
- noOperation(4): No operation is executed.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysConfigSaveStatus

description: The reason of saving flash operation failed.
Possible values are:
- noError(1): No error, saving flash successfully
or no saving flash operation is excuted.
- flashMediaFull(2): The save flash operation is failed
because flash media is full.
- createConfigFilesFailed(3): The save flash operation is
failed because configuration file is created
unsuccessfully.
- openConfigFilesFailed(4): The save flash operation is
failed because configuration file can't be
opened successfully.
- standbyCardCopyConfigFilesFailed(5) : The save flash operation
is failed because configuration file can't be
copied to the standby board.
- unknown(99): The save flash operation is failed for some
unknown error.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysConfigSaveFailedReason

description: This notification will be sent to management system when a profile
that has been applied is deleted.
If profile supports name, zxAnSysProfileName must be filled first.
If profile supports ID, zxAnSysProfileId should be filled
with profile ID.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysDelAppliedPrfFailed ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysProfileCategory s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysProfileName s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysProfileId i 9999 ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysProfileInfo s EXAMPLE

description: This object indicates the category of profile.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysProfileCategory

description: This object is used to indicate the profile name.
Empty string means that the profile does not support profile name.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysProfileName

description: This object is used to indicate the profile ID.
Value 0 means that the profile does not support ID.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysProfileId

description: This object is used to indicate the profile information, such as
showing the port list that the profile has been applied.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysProfileInfo

description: This notification will be sent to management system
when the configuration is changed.

event.Summary: Configuration is changed for manager of type:$v1 and location:$v2

description: Current configuration owner of the system.
- snmp(1): The configuration changed by
snmp manager.
- console(2): The configuration changed by
console user.
- telnet(3): The configuration changed by
virtual teletype terminal user.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysLastConfManagerType

description: If the zxAnSysLastConfManagerType is snmp(1)
the zxAnSysLastConfManagerLocation is the user's IP address.
If the zxAnSysLastConfManagerType is console(2),
the zxAnSysLastConfManagerLocation is empty string.
If the zxAnSysLastConfManagerType is telnet(3)
the zxAnSysLastConfManagerLocation is the user's IP address.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-SYS-MGMT-MIB::zxAnSysLastConfManagerLocation
